mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONECT_LOG(EMPL_ID, CONECT_LOG_MACADRS, CONECT_LOG_IP, CONECT_LOG_DATE) VALUES (#{emplId}, #{conectLogMacadrs}, #{conectLogIp}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN010' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS DUTY_REQUEST, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN011' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS ANSWER, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN012' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS TEAM_NOTICE, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN013' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS COMPANY_NOTICE, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN014' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS SCHEDULE, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN015' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS NEW_CHATTING_ROOM, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN016' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS EMAIL_RECEPTION, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN017' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS ELECTRON_SANCTION_RECEPTION, MAX(CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND = 'NTCN018' THEN COMMON_CODE_NTCN_AT END) AS ELECTRON_SANCTION_RESULT FROM NTCN_AT WHERE NTCN_AT_EMPL_ID = #{emplId}

SELECT A.EMPL_ID, A.EMPL_PASSWORD, A.EMPL_NM, A.EMPL_TELNO, A.EMPL_EMAIL, A.EMPL_ZIP, A.EMPL_ADRES, A.EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES, A.EMPL_ENCPN, A.EMPL_BRTHDY, A.ENABLED, A.COMMON_CODE_DEPT, A.COMMON_CODE_CLSF, A.COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS, A.COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR, B.AUTH_CODE, B.AUTH_EMP_ID, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME, UF2.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS SIGN_FILE_NAME FROM EMPL A JOIN AUTH B ON A.EMPL_ID = B.AUTH_EMP_ID JOIN PROFL P ON A.EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE JOIN SIGN S ON B.AUTH_EMP_ID = S.SIGN_EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF2 ON S.SIGN_ETPR_CODE = UF2.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE A.EMPL_ID = #{emplId}

SELECT EMPL_ID, EMPL_PASSWORD, EMPL_NM, EMPL_TELNO, EMPL_EMAIL, EMPL_ZIP, EMPL_ADRES, EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES, EMPL_ENCPN, EMPL_BRTHDY, ENABLED, COMMON_CODE_DEPT, COMMON_CODE_CLSF, COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS, COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR FROM EMPL

SELECT EMPL_ID, EMPL_PASSWORD, EMPL_NM, EMPL_TELNO, EMPL_EMAIL, EMPL_ZIP, EMPL_ADRES, EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES, EMPL_ENCPN, EMPL_BRTHDY, ENABLED, COMMON_CODE_DEPT, COMMON_CODE_CLSF, COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS, COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}

SELECT E.EMPL_NM, E.EMPL_BRTHDY, U.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFL_PHOTO_FILE_STRE_NM FROM EMPL E, PROFL P, UPLOAD_FILE U WHERE TO_CHAR(EMPL_BRTHDY, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND E.EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID AND P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = U.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE
SELECT * FROM EMPL WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{depCode} AND EMPL.EMPL_NM LIKE '%' || #{emplNm} || '%' ) ORDER BY #{sortBy} DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE UPLOAD_FILE SET UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM = #{fileName}, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM = #{originalFileName} WHERE UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE = (SELECT P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE FROM EMPL E JOIN PROFL P ON E.EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID WHERE E.EMPL_ID = #{emplId})

UPDATE UPLOAD_FILE SET UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM = #{fileName}, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM = #{originalFileName} WHERE UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE = (SELECT S.SIGN_ETPR_CODE FROM EMPL E JOIN SIGN S ON E.EMPL_ID = S.SIGN_EMPL_ID WHERE E.EMPL_ID = #{emplId})

UPDATE EMPL SET EMPL_NM = #{emplNm}, EMPL_PASSWORD = #{emplPassword}, EMPL_TELNO = #{emplTelno}, EMPL_ZIP = #{emplZip}, EMPL_ADRES = #{emplAdres}, EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES = #{emplDetailAdres}, COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR = #{commonCodeLastAcdmcr}, COMMON_CODE_CLSF = #{commonCodeClsf}, COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{commonCodeDept}, COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS = #{commonCodeHffcSttus} WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.EMPL_ID, C.CONECT_LOG_MACADRS, C.CONECT_LOG_IP, C.CONECT_LOG_DATE, E.EMPL_MACADRS FROM CONECT_LOG C, EMPL E WHERE C.EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND TO_CHAR(CONECT_LOG_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{today}
